select REC_TYPE_ID,count(REC_TYPE_ID) audit_count from pdsci.RES_REC rr,pdsci.RES_DOCTOR_SCH_PROCESS rdp where rr.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and rdp.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and user_flow = oper_user_flow and rr.SCH_DEPT_FLOW= rdp.SCH_DEPT_FLOW
and TEACHER_USER_FLOW=#{userFlow} and (AUDIT_STATUS_ID is null)
and HEAD_USER_FLOW=#{userFlow} and (HEAD_AUDIT_STATUS_ID is null )
GROUP BY REC_TYPE_ID

SELECT OPER_USER_FLOW||SCH_DEPT_FLOW||REC_TYPE_ID REC_KEY,COUNT(*) FINISH_COUNT FROM PDSCI.RES_REC WHERE RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND OPER_USER_FLOW IN
#{userFlow}
AND SCH_DEPT_FLOW IN
#{schDeptFlow}
AND AUDIT_STATUS_ID IS NULL
AND HEAD_AUDIT_STATUS_ID IS NULL
GROUP BY OPER_USER_FLOW,REC_TYPE_ID,SCH_DEPT_FLOW

SELECT RDSP.TEACHER_USER_FLOW TEACHER_FLOW,RDSP.TEACHER_USER_NAME TEACHER_NAME,COUNT(*) AUDIT_COUNT FROM PDSCI.RES_REC RR,PDSCI.RES_DOCTOR_SCH_PROCESS RDSP WHERE RR.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND RDSP.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND RR.OPER_USER_FLOW = RDSP.USER_FLOW AND RR.SCH_DEPT_FLOW = RDSP.SCH_DEPT_FLOW
AND RDSP.HEAD_USER_FLOW = #{headUserFlow}
AND RR.AUDIT_STATUS_ID IS NOT NULL
AND RR.AUDIT_STATUS_ID IS NULL
GROUP BY RDSP.TEACHER_USER_FLOW,RDSP.TEACHER_USER_NAME
